name: The Long Road (necrosaint, Ryanb2505, Theonlyrio)
description:
For best experience, download standalone build.

The Long Road

Travel the long road in this turn-based post-apocalpytic survival game. You lead a group of scavengers wandering the long road in search of a better life.

Instructions

Use the arrow keys to move. Use mouse to select event choices.

Credits

Rio Kisjantoro: Art, UI, Game Design

James Lucas: Programming, Game Design, SFX

Ryan Baylis: Music

Emily Thomason: Writing

Mini Jam 63

This game is a submission to the Mini Jam 63. The theme is "Future" and all games must be created under the limitation that they use colours only in a fixed palette.
